meanings.definition: (菌類学)銹菌目の、または銹胞子に関連する
meanings.english_definition: Relating to or characteristic of the Uredinales (rust fungi) or their urediniospores.

examples.sentence: uredinial stage of a rust fungus

etymology.value: Formed from 'uredinio-' (referring to urediniospores) + '-al' (suffix denoting pertaining to).
